name: Oscar San 2
description:
Here's the sequel of the action game I worked previously, Oscar San. Up to 2 players simultaneosly .It has more than 20 levels (some of them grouped by worlds) than the precuel .You got the same objective: Defeat all enemies inside the screen and survive. You can also use items to defeat enemies easier, including bosses .

Player 1 plays as Oscar San, while Player 2 plays as Meráry Suff .Player 1 uses A and D keys to move, S to crouch, W to jump and V to attack and confirm options .Player 2 uses Left & Right arrow keys to move, Down to crouch, Up to jump and P key to attack and confirm options .Both players can press Space Bar or Enter to pause the game .

In title screen, with the cursor situated in Start option, press V key to play as Player 1' or press P key to play as Player 2 .If you press Space or Enter both players will participate simultaneously. 

NOTE: Requires a lot of pacience to finish the game twice without closing it. Good Luck !!
